meaning_str.bing:
n. 沙；沙子；沙滩
v. （用砂纸或打磨机）打磨
网络. 沙色；沙地；砂粒

沙；沙子；沙粒；沙堆；沙地；沙土色；浅黄灰色；（~s）沙滩；沙丘；沙漠；（Sand）桑；桑德（人名）
用沙打磨；用砂纸打磨；把…磨光；撒沙于…；铺沙子于

1.en: "Chai, " he said to me with a cigarette clenched in his teeth, as he squatted in the hot sand to brew some mint tea.
1.cn: 他蹲在炽热的沙地上煮著些薄荷茶，“茶，”他嘴里咬著雪茄对我说。

2.en: The Sahara has not always been a wilderness of sand dunes.
2.cn: 撒哈拉地区并非从古便是一片充满沙丘的荒野。

3.en: Half buried in the sand I found a vintage Coca-Cola bottle. I dug it out and slipped it into my wetsuit as a souvenir.
3.cn: 我找到一个半掩在沙中、旧式的可口可乐瓶。我把它挖出来塞进我的潜水服里留做纪念。

0.en: No sand? But we wanted to make sand castles. Peppa and George love making sand castles.
0.cn: 没有沙子吗？那我们要怎么堆沙子城堡呢。佩奇和乔治喜欢堆沙子城堡。

1.en: Oh, where has the sand gone? There isn't any sand down this beach, Peppa.
1.cn: 噢，这里怎么没有沙子啊？这个海滩上没有沙子，佩奇。

2.en: Concrete is a construction material composed of sand, water and chemical admixtures. Chapter one, sand. Peppa, George and Mommy Pig have fallen asleep.
2.cn: 混凝土它是盖房子用的一种材料，由沙子水，还有化学添加剂组成。第一章，沙子。佩奇，乔治，还有猪妈妈都睡着了。

3.en: First, we put sand in the buckets. Like this. We turn the buckets upside down and tap them.
3.cn: 首先，把沙子装进同理。就像这样。然后把水桶翻个个轻拍一下。

4.en: Kick off those heels and feel the sand between your toes at The Mirage and Mandalay Bay resorts.
4.cn: 在米拉奇和曼得勒海湾度假村，记着脱下鞋子，感受一下沙子。

5.en: First, we fill the buckets with sand. We turn the buckets over and give them a little tap.
5.cn: 首先要在水桶里装满沙子。然后我们把水桶倒过来 接着再轻轻拍一拍。

6.en: That's good! Like, there's the beach and sunshine. Oh. Like the time we buried Dad in the sand up to his neck.
6.cn: 很好！比如阳光海滩噢，那次我们把爸爸埋进沙子里，只露出头。

7.en: Daddy! Daddy! Can we bury you in sand? Well. Please, Daddy! Oh, alright! Yippee!
7.cn: 爸爸！我们可以帮你埋在沙子里吗？这个...求你了，爸爸。噢，好吧！太棒了！

8.en: Peppa and George are burying Daddy Pig in the sand! Steady on! There! Now you can't escape! My head is getting a bit hot. Can I have my straw hat?
8.cn: 佩琪和乔治把猪爸爸埋在沙子里！慢慢来！好了！现在你跑不了了！我的头有点热。帮我带草帽吧？

9.en: Look. Our sand castle is still there. Let's play hide and seek. OK. One, two, three. There're not many places to hide on pirate island.
9.cn: 看，我们用沙子堆的城堡还在这里。我们一起来玩捉迷藏吧。好的，一二三。这里没有那么多可以藏的地方。

10.en: Germany is playing hopscotch. One, two, three. America, Russia, Spain and Greece are in the sand pit. I've builded a big sandcastle. Ye-ha.
10.cn: 德国在玩跳房子。一，二，三。美国，俄罗斯，西班牙和希腊在沙坑里玩。我用沙子建造了一座城堡。耶！

11.en: No, I am on my rocker, Riley. Did you know that there's so much trash at the beach that people can't even go barefoot in the sand because they might step on something bad?
11.cn: 没啊，我精神正常得很，莱丽，你知道海滩上垃圾多到人们都不能光脚走在沙子上，因为会踩到乱七八糟的脏东西上吗？

12.en: So the foundation is pure concrete and sand, no metal.
12.cn: 所以是用混凝土和沙石搭建的，不含金属物质。

13.en: George and Richard love the sand pit. George, Richard, today we are going to make sand castles.
13.cn: 治和理查德都喜欢堆沙。乔治，理查德，今天我们四个人 要一起来做个沙堡。

14.en: Edmond Elephant and Richard Rabbit are playing in the sand pit. Let's play in the sand pit. Okay.
14.cn: 大象埃德蒙和小兔理查德正在沙堆里玩。我们也去沙堆玩吧。好的。

15.en: That's nice. Maybe I'll just have a little sleep. George, let's make sand castles! Peppa and George are making sand castles!
15.cn: 这样就好了，也许我可以在这里小睡一会儿。乔治 ，我们来搭沙滩城堡吧。佩琪和乔治开始搭沙滩城堡！

16.en: I was the one freaking set of footprints in the sand!
16.cn: 我是那被人过了河就拆的桥！

17.en: Can you two big girls teach them to play together? Of course we can help them make sand castles. Good idea. Let's go to the sand pit.
17.cn: 你们两位姐姐可以教他们怎么一起玩吗？当然可以，我们可以帮他们一起做个沙堡啊。是个好主意，我们一起去沙堆那儿吧。

18.en: Tom, come with me. You know where the sand buckets are kept.
18.cn: 汤姆，跟我来，你知道防火沙桶在哪。

19.en: Anyone in the water or on the damp sand will be electrocuted.
19.cn: 所有在水里或湿沙滩上的人都会被电死。
